org.supercsv.ext.localization

クラス CsvExceptionConveter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.supercsv.ext.localization.CsvExceptionConveter

  • public class CsvExceptionConveter
extends Object
    SuperCsvException convert to Message Object.

    Message object build from CsvContext and CellProcessor.

    作成者:
    T.TSUCHIE
